channel.title: Shop help
channel.description: I've come to a conclusion, after a long battle with trying to spawn items in a 317 I give up, can't make my moparscape do it. So now I need help with item prices and new shops for player-rights = 0-3... I want to put claws, bgs, ags, sgs, zgs, bandos, sol, and fire cape, into one shop all priced at 0 gold pieces, problem is i don't know how. So now i need your help with the following, (server is called MTP V2 - Turmoil/Perfect Pking/Minigames - Best Pking source ever! this server can be found on the server downloads list, i advise you to download the server before posting because the code is a little different. Example: on client.java, loginmessage1 and 2 are all original runescape code, I can't find where to post different a log in message, because the old owner has a different login message that i want to change.) i want to know, which folder do i go to, to add a new shop, also how do i add items and how do i code in new prices into the (shop)? This will help so much so please feel free to post, this isn't a server source advertisement! I'm just telling others to inform them about the difference in coding! Please help, thanks.

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

I’ve come to a conclusion, after a long battle with trying to spawn items in a 317 I give up, can’t make my moparscape do it. So now I need help with item prices and new shops for player-rights = 0-3… I want to put claws, bgs, ags, sgs, zgs, bandos, sol, and fire cape, into one shop all priced at 0 gold pieces, problem is i don’t know how. So now i need your help with the following, (server is called MTP V2 - Turmoil/Perfect Pking/Minigames - Best Pking source ever! this server can be found on the server downloads list, i advise you to download the server before posting because the code is a little different. Example: on client.java, loginmessage1 and 2 are all original runescape code, I can’t find where to post different a log in message, because the old owner has a different login message that i want to change.) i want to know, which folder do i go to, to add a new shop, also how do i add items and how do i code in new prices into the (shop)?
This will help so much so please feel free to post, this isn’t a server source advertisement! I’m just telling others to inform them about the difference in coding!
Please help, thanks.
